Name: CCI Pepperbox
Description:
Uses ModulShotguns for the stocks and grips!

This 50 barrels break action .22 Long Rifle gun can either be a fun little plinker or an angry swarm of bees thanks to the selector on the left side of the reciver! This selector allows you to fire all the 50 barrels!

Note :
In the future, if the break actions guns will have speedloaders, this will take a box of ammo like the ones from CCI (hence the name of the gun)
